about_the_game:
Discover the Story


Unbeknownst to its inhabitants, the Balance of the realm known as Illumnia is on the verge of collapse. Dormant forces are emerging, attempting to establish a new world order and lay to rest the land of long dead gods. Change is on the horizon and our heroes have no choice but to face it head on.

Join the sibling duo, Hitendra and Thybit, on their journeys exploring the realms of Illumnia and Tenebrye. Defeat challenging enemies, help friendly faces, and solve tricky puzzles in an effort to unite with each other and put a stop to the encroaching darkness.

Utilize Different Combat Styles


As Hitendra, master of the sword, the player will engage in a more classic action combat style that challenges the player’s ability to react and adapt to enemy attacks. Use melee abilities to defeat Hit’s opponents in rigorous brawls against a variety of enemies.

As Thybit, the sorcerer extraordinaire, the player will have a more metroidvania leaning gameplay experience that will have tons of puzzles for Bit to solve. Similarly, the enemies that Bit will encounter will require creative methods to defeat. Use magical ranged abilities to navigate and defeat evildoers.

Key Features

Two Protagonists
Two heroes means two different experiences. Wield Hit’s mighty sword as you explore the land of light or utilize Bit’s arcane intellect while trying to survive in the realm of souls.
Diverse Environments
Various biomes from mercenary-infested forests and crumbling cities, to haunted deserts and forgotten catacombs.
Exploration
Hidden paths and challenging obstacles reward the dedicated player with items and quests to help them on their journey.
Upgrades and Unlocks
Through various means, the player can find upgrades that boost their prowess or unlock new abilities that will make them feel like true demi-gods.

content_descriptors.notes: Use of Alcohol, Use of Tobacco, Corpses.

short_description: Hit n’ Bit is a dark fantasy Metroidvania platformer. Embark on two different journeys where you will fight monsters, explore a story-rich world, and encounter challenging puzzles. Reunite the royal siblings, defy the machinations of old gods, and redefine destiny!
